Omg you fucking retards never read the god damn read me... Here dumbasses This crack is a modified version of the old Razor1911 crack for GTA IV (1.0.4.0). It still mostly works for EFLC.

Note that, if not having installed EFLC with the 'official' installer, you will need to add the registry key
HKLM\Software\Rockstar Games\EFLC with a string value InstallFolder pointing to the installed folder.
Without this registry setting, EFLC will crash after the Rockstar North logo.

-- NTAuthority, 2010-04-14
